name: Nick Solana
text: it's not what we mean when we say Davao is safe, Roy. i wonder what you imagine what we mean by 'safe.' what i mean by safe is that i can trust my 16 yr old daughter is safe to walk the streets at any time and anywhere in Davao. and if you think  incidents like this happens with any sort of regularity in Davao, which i hear is 4x bigger than Metro Manila, then no they don't. we had our time as the killing fields during the early 1980s and i know what 'regularity' means because it wasn't strange to see policemen, plural, dead, everyday in the City when i was a kid passing through the main streets, as i was riding a jeepney. It's deplorable that it is happening on a regular basis in your everyday areas. It's inexcusable that the authorities are not doing anything about it, too.
